de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.controlpanel

Class BaseStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget
      • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control
        • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Scrollable
          • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
            • de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.controlpanel.BaseStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AgentStatus, OverlayStatus, PlaceStatus

    public abstract class BaseStatus
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
    The base status item implementation. All other status items must extend this.
    Author:
    Miquel Martin

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseStatus

        protected BaseStatus(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
          GUI gui,
          BasePanel panel,
          Object content,
          String caption,
          org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image icon)
        Crate a base panel. This will be called by the constructor of the inheriting class.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent composite
        gui - the container GUI
        panel - the panel where this status item belongs
        content - the element being shown
        caption - the caption on top of the status item.
        icon - the icon shown next to the caption.

      • BaseStatus

        protected BaseStatus(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
          GUI gui,
          BasePanel panel,
          Object content,
          String caption,
          org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image icon,
          org.eclipse.swt.graphics.RGB color)
        Create a base panel, but specify the color of the marker.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent composite
        gui - the container GUI
        panel - the panel where this status item belongs
        content - the element being shown
        caption - the caption on top of the status item.
        icon - the icon shown next to the caption.
        color - the color of the marker.
